Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kristina Cannon
Reviews.Content: For being so low in price, this tablet works great!! It's operating system is very fast, and it runs great!

Reviews.Title: Freezes all the time
Reviews.Author: Donna Henn
Reviews.Content: I really wish I had NEVER purchased this tablet. It freezes on me all the time. Very slow, poor graphics too. I even bought a 32 GB mini SD card for it thinking that if I put more memory in it that it would help it to work better. It has been sitting aside not even turned on for 2 weeks now. I wish I had NEVER wasted my money and by the time I got my SD card to see if that would help, I was past my return time. Please do not buy this tablet.

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich, 9 inches Display
All winner ARM CORTEX A8 OMAP 3 1.2 GHz
8 GB Flash Memory, 512 GB RAM Memory
3 pounds
ProductInfo.Name: Kocaso M9100 M9100PUR 9-Inch 8 GB Tablet (Purple)
